title: 100% CPU usage when starting node on Raspberry PI3b+ on Android Things
body:
was introduced with 1.8.4 - same code on 1.8.3 does not block with 100%CPU usage
```
(pprof) top10
Showing nodes accounting for 29.89s, 99.73% of 29.97s total
Dropped 42 nodes (cum <= 0.15s)
Showing top 10 nodes out of 15
      flat  flat%   sum%        cum   cum%
    29.89s 99.73% 99.73%     29.89s 99.73%  runtime.cgocall
         0     0% 99.73%     29.89s 99.73%  github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/accounts/usbwallet.(*Hub).refreshWallets
         0     0% 99.73%     29.89s 99.73%  github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/accounts/usbwallet.NewLedgerHub
         0     0% 99.73%     29.89s 99.73%  github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/accounts/usbwallet.newHub
         0     0% 99.73%     29.89s 99.73%  github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/mobile.NewNode
         0     0% 99.73%     29.89s 99.73%  github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/node.New
         0     0% 99.73%     29.89s 99.73%  github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/node.makeAccountManager
         0     0% 99.73%     29.89s 99.73%  github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/vendor/github.com/karalabe/hid.Enumerate
         0     0% 99.73%     29.89s 99.73%  github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/vendor/github.com/karalabe/hid._Cfunc_hid_enumerate
         0     0% 99.73%     29.89s 99.73%  main._cgoexpwrap_35c606efd04e_proxygeth__NewNode
```
![pi3_problem_prof big](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/111600/40428882-9a0538c0-5ea1-11e8-942d-34b9f3152e41.png)

Can't we just drop all the HID code - don't really think this is very helpful on mobile anyway and just wastes memory/cpu-cycles and makes problems like this
